title: Failed to propose block due to aggregation bits and committee not having the same length
body:
This looks different from #2576. Seen on Medalla testnet. Note the "ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to produce block" in the middle.


### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: teku/v0.12.4-dev-df300e3b/linux-x86_64/-privatebuild-openjdk64bitservervm-java-13
* Java version: openjdk 13.0.3 2020-04-14
* OS Name & Version: Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS
I suspect this is a duplicate of #2576. The committee sizes may differ on different forks - especially as they diverge for some time because the number of active validators can vary.
In fact, going to close this one as a duplicate of #2576.
